name: Radarr
description: Ensures Radarr (Docker or native service) is running and its API responds.
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then if docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^radarr$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active radarr 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start radarr 2>/dev/null || docker restart radarr 2>/dev/null || true; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart radarr 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 5; if curl -fs --max-time 5 http://localhost:7878/api/v3/system/status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'version'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
